Elita/Talon/Hydras:

"Who is he??"said Elita while she looked the dark Rodimus and hide"looks 
like my dad... But more Scary..."

****************************

Talon looked around and said nervous "What's goin on?"


**************************************

Hydras opened a comlink to all his forces "Be careful, Seekers are aroundif 
you see them open fire. Scourge what is goin on there?"

Then Hydras send a com link back to Cryotek, that was highly encoded "What's 
wrong?? what's goin on?"

-----Mensaje original----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Friday, August 12, 2011 2:03 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Strange meetings - new friends & old enemies

> <OLD>
>
> Something was terribly wrong.  Straight Shot looks to Waspinator with a
> frightened expression.  Just like him she did NOT like the sight of Dark
> Rodimus.  But instead of running she prepares to defend both herself and
> Waspinator, and arms her forearm arrow launcher.
>
> " Okay get ready ta fly in the opposite direction.  If he goes inta alt
> mode, which I hope he does, I can pop his tires.  That'll slow him down.
> Don't worry, I won't let him hurt you."

<NEW>

"Don't worry Waspinator, she won't let me hurt you." The voice was
definitly that of DARK RODIMUS a dark parody of the real one. Smooth
and composed it was the very essence of evil, and it was mocking
WASPINATOR. "Since when do you side with the Maximals?" The smile on
his face was wicked.

"Wazzpinator does not side with foolish Maximals." WASPINATOR buzzed
in the air, "Hydras made Wazzpinator side with them, and now the dark
fire bot is back again." WASPINATOR rockets are ready, but he still is
unsure if he should fire against someone who was once an ally.

SCOURGE flew around DARK RODIMUS. "What are you doing here, we thought
you were dead. We see the other Rodimus too. . . . how?"

There was a knowing smile from DARK RODIMUS as he reached down and
picked up something off the ground, He looked back up at STRAIGHT
SHOT, "Maximals are always so predictable, you all want to shoot me,
and these Predacons won't shoot me because they are not sure who I am,
and you . . . " He chuckled, "You might shoot, but you will only try
to main me."

DARK RODIMUS laughed as he was looked at all of them. "Don't you know
it might already be too late?"


> <OLD>
>
> Meanwhile, Tucson catches Noctorro but he senses something wrong.  The 
> other
> Fuzors, they did not follow and he growls, knowing that he could have to
> deploy another sonar roar.
>
> " I copy you Leo Prime...  Definitely an evil force is at play and I'm
> determined to find out the cause.  Whatever it is, has effected the 
> Fuzors..
>  I have a feeling it could return for Rodimus.  I'm going to meet Noctorro
> now."

<NEW>

"Force, or forces? LEO said. "We have so many enemies these days.
Insectile aliens, the minions of Unicron, who ever it is that called
the Dinosaurs and the Predacons you have allied yourself with." Leo
sounded definitly concerned. "Be very careful."

Keep me apprised." He said. "Leo Out."

> <OLD>
>
> The silver dragon leaps up into the air to meet Noctorro.  He hovers in a
> defensive mode.
>
> "WHERE ARE THE OTHERS!? ANSWER ME!"
>
> Tucson booms with a roar mixed in.

<NEW>

It took only a few more moments for the Fuzor to reach TUSCON. As he
got closer he could see that was heavily damaged, his frame seemingly
shot or burned by something.

"They . . . attacked!!" NOCTORRO paused and then started again,
"Seekers, they just appeared . . . from no where . . . We were caught
off guard!" There was a pause again, "Ambushed."

* * * * * * * *

Meanwhile as TUSCON was talking with NOCTORRO . . .

HYDRAS recieved a call on an encrypted channel. "Hydras, can you read
me? Hydras!" The voice on the other end of the line was CRYOTEK.

(TAG)

Preston
